replies.body: so if I play Garen against Galio, am I destroying my protector?

{{sticker:galio-happy}} {{sticker:garen-swing}} 
I like to think you're having a friendly spar. If Garen knew what Galio meant to Lux I'm sure he'd think so too.
Mm comments don't get much attention.

I feel like a motionless Galio, checking the comments in the promoted OCE news articles every few days, waiting for a player to drop a comment I can engage with to grant me life again.
{{sticker:galio-happy}}

I like the separation between Kayle and Morgana as a "light of burning wrath"
and "Pain of dark and humbled insight". Makes for more of an almost ying and yang scene.
Who changed my badass Morgana to Emogana?
Jihn mains where you at for 4?
